box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
- Create a packet
- Attach CRC checksum
- Encrypt packet with password + IV
- Prefix packet with IV
- Send to Access Point

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 243px; height: 1px; padding-top: 286px; margin-left: 677px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
- Receive packet
- Decrypt packet with password + IV
- Check CRC to see if packet modified
- Send decrypted packet to dest
